Customer Reviews Section.Layout: Grid-based layout with a focus on customer reviews. Divided into three columns on larger screens and two on smaller screens.
Customer Reviews Section.Design: Clean and organized layout. Emphasizes customer feedback through star ratings, individual reviews, and an invitation to write a review.

Key Elements.Overview Box: Includes a header, star rating, summary information, and a call-to-action button to write a review.
Key Elements.Star Rating Visualization: Displays distribution of different star ratings using progress bars.
Key Elements.Individual Reviews: Detailed reviews with star ratings, reviewer names, dates, and comments.
Key Elements.Read All Reviews Link: Prominent link encouraging users to read more reviews.

Customer Reviews Section.Use Cases: Ideal for e-commerce sites, service providers, and platforms that rely heavily on user feedback to build trust and credibility.
